question: You recently did a short cookery course. The school has asked for your feedback on this course.Write a letter to the course director at the cookery school. In your letterDescribe what you enjoyed about the courseSay how much cooking you’ve done since the courseSuggest another cookery course you’d like the school to offer
text: I am writing this letter to express my sincere thanks to our beloved staff members and their dedication and extended support as well. It is a great opportunity to complete the course here and feel  blessed to have such a kind of you everyone, we enjoyed every moment throughout the course.

Early days of the course, I was nothing and do not know anything about basic cookery things and did not even have any idea of the western style of cooking. However, I learned a lot about domestic and international cooking styles and also I got  good command of pizza making with different vegetables.

As you know, the local hotels are updating with different kinds of vegetable food items. Hence, I would suggest you to please include some vegan related courses as well for the upcoming years. So that the new students will learn and upgrade their knowledge as per the industry needs.
I look forward to hearing your response to this suggestion. Hope this will be done soon.
